meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the river teend with fish.
meanings.sent2: The bucket teend water all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing bathtub teend bubbles onto the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent4: Her heart teend with joy as she watched her children play.
meanings.sent5: The garden teend with colorful flowers, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: to pour out or empty out
meanings.sent1: Carefully, she teend the contents of the cup into the sink.
meanings.sent2: He teend the sand out of his shoes after a day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The magician teend a stream of coins from his hat, amazing the audience.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds teend rain onto the parched earth below.
meanings.sent5: She teend her emotions out in her diary, finding relief in writing.

meanings.definition: to be full of or swarming with
meanings.sent1: The picnic area teend with families enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent2: The forest teend with chirping birds and scampering squirrels.
meanings.sent3: The party teend with laughter and music late into the night.
meanings.sent4: The beehive teend with busy worker bees collecting nectar.
meanings.sent5: The city streets teend with people rushing to work in the morning.
